text: Hey babe, do you remember that local actress we talked about the other day?
Well, I got a message from her on social media. She's interested in collaborating with us.
Hmm, I don't know. Remember our deal? No touching other girls.
Don't worry, we'll keep it professional. We'll just promote her and help train her.
Okay, I guess that's fine. Let's see what she has to offer.
